lead_paragraph: The sheriff of San Bernardino County said that after watching the video, he believed the use of force to be “excessive.”

headline.print_headline: 10 California Deputies Put on Leave After Beating
headline.main: 10 California Deputies Are Put on Leave After Beating

snippet: The sheriff of San Bernardino County said that after watching the video, he believed the use of force to be “excessive.”
abstract: San Bernadino County, Calif, sheriff's office places 10 deputies on paid administrative leave in connection with beating of suspect Francis Pusok following high-speed car chase and desert foot pursuit; video shot from news helicopter appears to show excessive force on part of deputies, and has triggered a civil rights investigation by the FBI.
